description: BlueOcean APU Metrics based on the prometheus metrics from github.com/dijiujun/boss_apu_exporter

panels.description: The official product name of the GPU. This is an alphanumeric string. For all products.
panels.title: Name

panels.description: The chip type of the card
panels.title: Chip Type

panels.description: The last measured power draw for the entire board, in watts.
panels.title: Power Draw

panels.description: Core GPU temperature. in degrees C.
panels.title: Card Temperature

panels.description: Core GPU temperature. in degrees C.
panels.title: Inlet Temperature

panels.description: Core GPU temperature. in degrees C.
panels.title: Outlet Temperature

panels.description: The version of the installed NVIDIA display driver. This is an alphanumeric string.
panels.title: Bus ID

panels.description: The width of pcie link
panels.title: Link Width

panels.description: The id of board
panels.title: Board ID

panels.description: The version of CPLD
panels.title: CPLD Version

panels.description: The version of the installed NVIDIA display driver. This is an alphanumeric string.
panels.title: Soft Version

panels.description: The BIOS of the GPU board.
panels.title: APU Version

panels.description: The last measured power draw for the entire board, in watts. Only available if power management is supported. This reading is accurate to within +/- 5 watts
